Package bss.Data

Class DataAccess

java.lang.Object
bss.Data.DataAccess
public class DataAccess extends Object
Provides methods for reading from and writing to resource files.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static LinkedHashMap<String,Keyword>
    getAmazonList()
    Reads the Amazon list from a JSON file and returns it as a LinkedHashMap.

  • Method Details

    • getPath

      public static String getPath(String fileName)
      Returns the full path to a file in the resource directory.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the file
      Returns:
      the full path to the file

    • readFromJson

      public static Object readFromJson(String fileName, Type type)
      Reads data from a JSON file and deserializes it into an object of the specified type.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the JSON file (without extension)
      type - the type of the object to deserialize
      Returns:
      the deserialized object, or null if the file is not found

    • writeToJson

      public static void writeToJson(String fileName, Object obj)
      Serializes an object to JSON and writes it to a file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the file (without extension) to write to
      obj - the object to serialize and write

    • getImageIcon

      public static ImageIcon getImageIcon(String fileName)
      Retrieves an ImageIcon from the resource directory.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the image file
      Returns:
      the ImageIcon, or null if the image cannot be accessed

    • getTestData

      public static ArrayList<SearchTerm> getTestData()
      Reads test data from a JSON file and returns it as an ArrayList of SearchTerm.
      Returns:
      the list of test data

    • getSearchTermList

      public static ArrayList<SearchTerm> getSearchTermList(String fileName)
      Reads search terms from a JSON file and returns them as an ArrayList of SearchTerm.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the JSON file (without extension)
      Returns:
      the list of search terms

    • getMasterList

      public static LinkedHashMap<String,LinkedHashMap<String,Keyword>> getMasterList()
      Reads the master list from a JSON file and returns it as a LinkedHashMap.
      Returns:
      the master list

    • getAmazonList

      public static LinkedHashMap<String,Keyword> getAmazonList()
      Reads the Amazon list from a JSON file and returns it as a LinkedHashMap.
      Returns:
      the Amazon list

    • getDictionary

      public static KeywordDictionary getDictionary()
      Reads the keyword dictionary from a JSON file and returns it as a KeywordDictionary.
      Returns:
      the keyword dictionary, or null if the file cannot be accessed

    • getInstance

      public static DataAccess getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of the DataAccess class.

      Initializes the instance if it does not already exist.

      Returns:
      the singleton instance of DataAccess
